Events that occurred on 27 May.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1922 – Actor Christopher Lee is born.
1930 - The University Press of Oxford sends J.R.R. Tolkien a copy of A Middle English Reader.
1932 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to A.F. Colborn.
1952 - J.R.R. Tolkien acts as host to the Oxford Dante Society.
1958 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Nancy Smith.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
Arwen and Elrond leave Lothlórien on their way to Minas Tirith.
